metadata.description: MAG team's curated collection of Claude Code plugins for modern full-stack development

plugins.name: frontend
plugins.description: Comprehensive frontend development toolkit with TypeScript, React 19, Vite, TanStack Router & Query v5, shadcn/ui. Features session-based artifact isolation, model preference persistence, shadcn/ui component library knowledge (60+ components), ultra-efficient agent orchestration, multi-model plan/code review (parallel, 3-5x speedup), 12 focused skills, intelligent workflow detection, and Chrome DevTools MCP debugging.

plugins.name: code-analysis
plugins.description: Deep code investigation and analysis toolkit. Features the codebase-detective agent for understanding code patterns, relationships, and architecture across complex codebases.

plugins.name: bun
plugins.description: Production-ready TypeScript backend development with Bun runtime. Includes specialized agents for backend development, API design, and DevOps. Features comprehensive best practices, tools integration (Biome, Prisma, Hono, Docker), testing workflows, and AWS ECS deployment guidance (2025).

plugins.name: orchestration
plugins.description: Shared multi-agent coordination and workflow orchestration patterns for complex Claude Code workflows. Skills-only plugin providing proven patterns for parallel execution (3-5x speedup), multi-model validation (Grok/Gemini/GPT-5), quality gates, TDD loops, TodoWrite phase tracking, and comprehensive error recovery. Battle-tested patterns from 100+ days production use.

plugins.name: agentdev
plugins.description: Create, implement, and review Claude Code agents and commands with multi-model validation. Full-cycle development workflow: design (architect) → plan review → implementation (developer) → quality review (reviewer) → iteration. Features parallel external model reviews, quality gates, and comprehensive XML/YAML standards.
